Articles.Content:
i was just wondering if they eventually implement the cockpit camera, wont all the modders have to rewrite cockpits for all their capsules?

are any of our modders working on this as we speak?

We have little idea how it would work; would each capsule have its interior space modeled in the model file, a separate model file; or are cockpits standalone 'parts' or whatever, and you simply call one of them in the commandpod CFG file (which means you could use a default interior, or make your own)

Until we know more, its all speculation, and possibly wasted work.
yeah thats pretty much how i thought the case would be.
